Uses of Class
javax.accessibility.AccessibleTextSequence

  • Packages that use AccessibleTextSequence 
    Package Description
    javax.accessibility
    Defines a contract between user-interface components and an assistive technology that provides access to those components.
    javax.swing
    Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms.
    javax.swing.text
    Provides classes and interfaces that deal with editable and noneditable text components.

    • Uses of AccessibleTextSequence in javax.accessibility

      Methods in javax.accessibility that return AccessibleTextSequence 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessibleTextSequence AccessibleExtendedText.getTextSequenceAfter(int part, int index)
      Returns the AccessibleTextSequence after a given index.
      AccessibleTextSequence AccessibleExtendedText.getTextSequenceAt(int part, int index)
      Returns the AccessibleTextSequence at a given index.
      AccessibleTextSequence AccessibleExtendedText.getTextSequenceBefore(int part, int index)
      Returns the AccessibleTextSequence before a given index.
